sections.title: Introduction
content: Welcome to Coreway Solution. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.
Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site or use our services.

subsections.title: 2.1 Personal Information
content: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:
list: Contact us through our website forms
Subscribe to our newsletters or updates
Register for an account or service
additionalList: Name and contact information (email, phone number)

subsections.title: 2.2 Automatically Collected Information
content: When you visit our website, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including:
list: Pages visited and time spent on pages

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
content: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:
list: Responding to your inquiries and support requests
Personalizing your experience on our website
Analyzing usage patterns to improve our services
Detecting and preventing fraud or security issues

sections.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

highlightList.title: Service Providers:
highlightList.text: With trusted third-party vendors who assist in operating our website and providing services

highlightList.title: Business Transfers:
highlightList.text: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

highlightList.title: Legal Requirements:
highlightList.text: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety

highlightList.title: With Your Consent:
highlightList.text: When you explicitly authorize us to share information

sections.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our website.

highlightList.title: Analytics Cookies:
highlightList.text: Help us understand how visitors use our site

highlightList.title: Marketing Cookies:
highlightList.text: Track your browsing activity to deliver relevant ads

sections.title: Data Security
content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include:
additionalContent: However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

sections.title: Your Privacy Rights
content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:

highlightList.title: Access:
highlightList.text: Request access to your personal information

highlightList.title: Deletion:
highlightList.text: Request deletion of your personal information

highlightList.title: Portability:
highlightList.text: Request a copy of your data in a portable format

additionalContent: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

sections.title: Third-Party Links
content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
content: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

sections.title: International Data Transfers
content: Your information may be transferred to and maintained on servers located outside of your state, province, country, or other governmental jurisdiction. We take appropriate steps to ensure that your data is treated securely and in accordance with this privacy policy.

sections.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. You are advised to review this privacy policy periodically for any changes.
